text: Thank you God for another day.
When you can’t, God can.

The more you pray,
the more you’ll see
God working in your life.
When you wake up, talk to God first.
Go to God first, not last.

The more you trust God, 
the more He amazes you.

Don't make any moves 
without praying about it first.
Life isn't always good, but God is.

Following Jesus is the best 
decision I've ever made.
Trust God always.

God can.
God will.
End of story.
God really does hear your prayers.

God believes in you more 
than you believe in yourself.
What a friend we have in Jesus.
Prayer changes things.
Believe in what you pray for.

One day you’ll see why 
God made you wait.
Reasons why I don’t fear: God
Trust that God knows best.
Trust God even when it’s hard.
All I want is more of God.
Dear God, thank you so much for not giving up on me ever.
Dear God, thank you for never forgetting me.
Dear God, thank you so much for being my strength always.
God gave you those dreams for a reason. Trust Him.

Dear God,
I need you, I can’t do this on my own.
I fell in love with Jesus because He loved me when I couldn’t even love myself.
Replacing “why is this happening to me” with “what is God trying to teach me” is a game changer for sure.
Closed doors are just God’s way of saying, “I’ve got something so much better in store for you.

Stay calm. I will fight for you.
Exodus 14:14
Dear God, I need you so much.

God heard your prayers, 
now trust His timing.
Everything I have, I owe to God.
Prayer changes the person who prays.

God, I have no idea where you 
are taking me, but I trust you.
Try again, this time with God.

Pray about it as much 
as you think about it.
Dear God: Without you I’m nothing.

I know what you need.
Trust that I will provide for you.
Luke 12:22-34
God’s timing, not yours.
Don’t worry, Pray.
Life changes. God doesn’t. Trust Him.

Dear God,
I need you, I can’t do this on my own.

My hope is not in this world. 
My hope is in Jesus Christ.
Don’t over think, Pray.
Prayer is a relationship with God.

Talk to God before bed.
He misses you.
Too blessed to be stressed.

When the pain is to deep,
talk to God.

Trust God even when the 
answer is “wait.”
God will never fail you.

Wait for the person that prays 
and talks to God about you.

Dear God,
I just wanted to say thank you.
He is not here, He has RISEN.
JESUS is the Resurrection and the Life.
When I call on God, All things are possible.

Jesus loves.
He knows.
He cares. 
He sees.
He understands.
He heals.
He saves.
He lives.
He provides.
He forgives.
Jesus can heal anything.

Jesus owed me nothing, 
but He gave me everything.

I love God and I’m 
not ashamed to say it. 
Jesus is Lord.

You are never too lost to be 
saved by Jesus Christ.
God is my provider.
What a friend we have in Jesus.
Prayer is how I fight my battles.
God has been so good to me.
Jesus is the answer.
God hasn’t left you.
Jesus Christ changed my life.

1. Pray 
2. Wait 
3. Trust

God, forgive me if I’ve asked 
you more than I’ve thanked you.
Everything I have is because of God.
God knows exactly what He’s doing.

I can’t.
God can. 
I can through Him.

Dear God,
help me to put you 
first in every situation.
When you can’t. God can.

God knows what you need.
Go to Him.
I want what God wants for me.

If they are pulling you closer to God,
don’t let them go.
Never give up on praying for someone.
God can and God will.

Reasons I’m not worrying: 

1. God
My future is in God's hands.
Lord, prepare me for what I’m praying for.
Go to God first, not last.
Prayer is so powerful.
Never doubt what one prayer can do.
I'm trusting you Lord.
When the person you prayed for becomes the person you pray with.
Keep trusting God even when it doesn't make sense.
Pray on it. Pray over it. Pray through it.
Talk to God, He misses you.
I want my relationship with God to become closer and stronger in 2022.
God will never let you go.

One day you’ll see why 
God made you wait.
I trust you, God.

Even when you don’t understand, 
TRUST GOD.
I want what God wants for me.
We need Jesus!!
Stop worrying. Trust God.

I’ve given God a million
reasons not to love me. 
None of them changed 
His mind.
God has been so good to me.

When the time is right, 
God will make it happen.

Jesus heals.

Jesus loves. 
Jesus saves.
If you give God your heart, He will help you change your habits.
Jesus, You are enough for me.
God’s timing, not mine.
Give it all to God.

If you talk to God before bed, 
you will not have time to worry.

You can’t say God is silent 
when your Bible is closed.

Find someone willing to
seek God with you.
Life changes. God doesn’t. Trust Him.

Love has a name. 

Jesus
Pray through everything.
God is all you need.
God’s plan is worth waiting for.
God, I trust you.
Live by faith, not by fear.
Pray, Wait, and Trust God.

Faith can overcome anything.

1 John 5:4

Jesus,
help us to love like you.
Always put your hope in God.
go to God first, not last.
I want my relationship with God to become closer and stronger in 2021.

Pray.
Pray for family.
Pray for friends.
Pray for you.
Pray for us.
Pray for them.
Pray again.
Never stop praying.
Pray.

God is the only reason
I made it this far.

I loved you at your darkest.
Romans 5:8

I just wanted to say thank you.
Talk to God today.
Don’t overthink, Pray.

The secret is God. 

God is the answer to everything!!

Lord,
forgive me for my sins.

And even now, 
God is still good.
Praying for you.

Our God is a God of second chances,
fresh starts, and new beginnings.

Date someone who wants 
to chase God with you.
Run to God when all feels lost.

God’s got this.

brag about God’s love for me 
because it never fails.

so good to me.

Dear God, Happy Father’s Day!!

Thank God for what you have,
Trust God for what you need.

There’s no one Jesus loves 
more than you.
God, you have been so good to me.
Do not withhold your mercy from me, Lord; may your love and faithfulness always protect me. Psalm 40:11
Go to God first, not last.

God is the only one that can 
turn your mess into a message.
